amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 117-3 as en bloc No. 3: Nos. 14, 15, 16, 18, 19, 21, 23 and 25.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendments (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A004) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mr. Levin (MI).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendments (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Levin (MI) amendments (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
